title: [EUW]-[Diamond 3+]-[LF (German) Marksman]-[Ranked 5v5 , Tournaments]
body:
Our Team is looking for a Diamond 3+ Marksman to join us on the rift. Top: Dia 3 , Jungle: Dia 3 , Mid: Dia1-Master , Sup: Dia 5

We are all german so it would be nice if you are german aswell or able to talk it because it would make the communication a lot easier.
Our goal is to climb the teamranked ladder to at least diamond and play in small and bigger tournaments. We try to train 2-3 times a week and mainly communicate via whatsapp , client or facebook. If you are interested just comment your ign. I will contact you asap or add me on League (ign. WiraRasca)

Thanks for reading and good luck on the rift!

replies.body: sinnvoll mich direkt wieder zu löschen btw
Add nochmal, Sorry hab die ganzen Anfragen von den Silberleuten gelöscht. Vlt. bin ich auch auf deine gekommen.

http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/de/c/clans-teams-de/IEKI0gfj-dia-adc-lft

falls interesse besteht adden, muss nur leider jetzt weg.
